FISSPy Analysis¶

fisspy.analysis.doppler Module¶

Doppler

This module calculate line of sight doppler velocities for each pixels of a FISS fts data.

Functions¶

wavecalib(band, profile[, method]) Calibrate the wavelength for FISS spectrum profile.
lambdameter(wv, data0[, hw, sp, wvinput]) Determine the Lambdameter chord center for a given half width or intensity.
LOS_velocity(wv, data[, hw, band]) Calculte the Line-of-Sight velocity of given data.

fisspy.analysis.forecast Module¶

Functions¶

ARcast(data, time[, dt, axis, missing]) Forecast the data by using AutoRegressive method.

fisspy.analysis.wavelet Module¶

Calculate the wavelet and its significance.

Functions¶

wavelet(y, dt[, dj, s0, j, mother, param, pad]) Compute the wavelet transform of the given y with sampling rate dt.
iwavelet(wave, scale, dt[, dj, mother, param]) Inverse the wavelet to get the time-series
motherfunc(mother, k, scale, param) Compute the Fourier factor and period.
motherparam(mother[, param]) Get the some values for given mother function of wavelet.
wave_signif(y, dt, scale[, sigtest, mother, ...]) Compute the significance levels for a wavelet transform.
chisquare_inv(p, v) Inverse of chi-square cumulative distribution function(CDF).
chisquare_solve(xguess, p, v) Chisqure_solve
wave_coherency(wave1, time1, scale1, wave2, ...) Compute the wavelet coherency between two time series.
fast_conv(f, g, nt) Fast convolution two given function f and g (method 1)
fast_conv2(f, g) Fast convolution two given function f and g (method2)
